metadata.title: CVE-2020-7925 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Incorrect validation of user input in the role name parser may lead to useof uninitialized memory allowing an unauthenticated attacker to use aspecially crafted request to cause a denial of service. This issue affects:MongoDB Inc. MongoDB Server v4.4 versions prior to 4.4.0-rc12; v4.2versions prior to 4.2.9.

criterions.comment: mongodb: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
